Title: Weathering with You
Description: A young boy runs away to Tokyo and meets a girl who can control the weather.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: In Dramas, character conflict and development move the plot forward.

Director.Name: Makoto Shinkai
Director.Bio: Makoto Shinkkai is a Japanese director, writer, producer, editor, voice actor, and animator. Shinkai studied Japanese literature at Chuo University where he was a member of the juvenile literature club.

Title: Your Name.
Description: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. when a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: The drama genre features stories with high stakes and a lot of conflicts. They are plot-driven and demand that every character and scene move the story forward.

Director.Name: Makoto Shinkai
Director.Bio: Makoto Shinkkai is a Japanese director, writer, producer, editor, voice actor, and animator. Shinkai studied Japanese literature at Chuo University where he was a member of the juvenile literature club.

Title: A Silent Voice: The Movie
Description: A young man is ostracized by his classmates after he bullies a deaf girl to the point where she moves away. Years later, he sets off on a path for redemption.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: The drama genre features stories with high stakes and a lot of conflicts. They are plot-driven and demand that every character and scene move the story forward.

Director.Name: Naoko Yamada
Director.Bio: Naoko Yamada is a Japanese animator, television, and film director. Working at Kyoto Animation, she directed the K-On! and Tamako Market anime series and the anime film 'A Silent Voice'.

Director.Name: Hayao Miyazaki
Director.Bio: Hayao Miyazaki is a Japanese film director, producer, screenwriter, animator, author, and manga artist. He co-founded the well-renowned Studio Ghibli, a film and animation studio, and has developed a legacy of animated films.

Title: Summer Wars
Description: A student tries to fix a problem he accidentally cause in OZ, a digital world, while pretending to be the fiance of his friend at her grandmother's 90th birthday.

Genre.Name: Adventure
Genre.Description: Films in the adventure genre usually contain the same basic genre elements of an action movie, but with a focus on the setting. Adventure movies are usually set in exotic, far away, or unfamiliar locations.

Director.Name: Mamoru Hosoda
Director.Bio: Mamoru Hosoda is a Japanese film director and animator. Formerly employed at Toei Animation, he went to work at Madhouse from 2005 to 2011. Hosoda left Madhouse in 2011 to establish his own animation studio, Studio Chizu.

Title: Wolf Children
Description: A young woman must find a way to raise her werewolf children after their father unexpectedly dies, while hiding their trait from society.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: The drama genre features stories with high stakes and a lot of conflicts. They are plot-driven and demand that every character and scene move the story forward.

Director.Name: Mamoru Hosoda
Director.Bio: Mamoru Hosoda is a Japanese film director and animator. Formerly employed at Toei Animation, he went to work at Madhouse from 2005 to 2011. Hosoda left Madhouse in 2011 to establish his own animation studio, Studio Chizu.

Title: Persona 3 The Movie: #4 Winter of Rebirth
Description: The season changes to winter. Makoto makes a decision in order to greet the spring that is waiting beyond.

Genre.Name: Action
Genre.Description: Movies in the action genre are fast-paced and include a lot of action like fight scenes, chases scenes, and slow-motion shots. They can fature superheroes, martial arts, or exciting stunts. These high-octane films are more about the execution of the plot rather than the plot itself. Action movies are meant to be thrilling to watch and leave audience members on the edge of their seats.

Director.Name: Tomohisa Taguchi
Director.Bio: Not much is known about Tomohisa Taguchi. This director has worked on animating popular Japanese media such as the Digimon and Persona series.

Title: Howl's Moving Castle
Description: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

Genre.Name: Adventure
Genre.Description: Films in the adventure genre usually contain the same basic genre elements of an action movie, but with a focus on the setting. Adventure movies are usually set in exotic, far away, or unfamiliar locations.

Director.Name: Hayao Miyazaki
Director.Bio: Hayao Miyazaki is a Japanese film director, producer, screenwriter, animator, author, and manga artist. He co-founded the well-renowned Studio Ghibli, a film and animation studio, and has developed a legacy of animated films.

Title: The Dark Knight
Description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

Genre.Name: Action
Genre.Description: Movies in the action genre are fast-paced and include a lot of action like fight scenes, chases scenes, and slow-motion shots. They can fature superheroes, martial arts, or exciting stunts. These high-octane films are more about the execution of the plot rather than the plot itself. Action movies are meant to be thrilling to watch and leave audience members on the edge of their seats.

Director.Name: Christopher Nolan
Director.Bio: Nolan is well known for his cerebral, often nonlinear, storytelling. Over the course of 15 years of filmmaking, he has gone from low-budget independent films to working on some of the biggest blockbusters ever made.

Title: Independence Day
Description: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankind's best weapon is the will to survive.

Genre.Name: Sci-fi
Genre.Description: Science fiction (or sci-fi) is a film genre that uses speculative, fictional science-based depictions of phenomena that are not fully accepted by mainstream science, such as extraterrestrial lifeforms, spacecraft, robots, cyborgs, interstellar travel or other technologies.

Director.Name: Roland Emmerich
Director.Bio: Roland Emmerich is a Germal film director and producer. In his youth, he pursued painting and sculpting. Emmerich originally wanted to be a production designer, but decided to be a director after watching the original Star Wars(1977).
